alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hamilton and northern Herkimer Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 150 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Moose, or near Old Forge, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, nickel size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Old Forge, Inlet, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Limekiln Lake Campground, Big Moose, Nicks Lake Campground, Eighth Lake Campground, Eagle Bay, Raquette Lake, Golden Beach Campground, Alger Island Public Campground, Little Rapids, Beaver River, Minnehaha, Carter Station, Quaker Beach, First Lake, Sagamore, Wolf Lake Landing and Brandreth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern New York.
